title: Related rates with volume of sphere

content.prompt:
The volume of a sphere is increasing at a rate of 6π cubic centimeters per hour. At what rate, in centimeters per hour, is its diameter increasing with respect to time at the instant the radius of the sphere is 3 centimeters?


(Note: The volume of a sphere with radius r is given by   V = 4 3 π r 3 .)

skill.text: Skill 3.F: Explain the meaning of mathematical solutions in context.
